numSensor.label: Total nominal battery capacity (battery expansion cabinets)
Total battery number of serial elements
Number of Power Share Plugs Available

stateSensor.label: Load on Battery/Battery Discharging (UPS in back-up mode)
Battery near end of Back-up (Low battery)
Auxiliary input frequency out of tolerance
The commands control table is managed
